title: 199- The Yin and Yang of Basketball
description: In 1891, a physical education teacher in Springfield, Massachusetts invented the game we would come to know as basketball. In setting the height of the baskets, he inadvertently created a design problem that would not be resolved for decades to come. The … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
